name: auto_complete_deprecating
description: Fetch auto-complete suggestions for a given query from the specified API.

query.description: The term or phrase for which to get suggestions.

name: qnas_list
description: Fetches a list of questions and answers related to a specific product from the RapidAPI Kohls service.

productid.description: The identifier of the product for which to list questions and answers.

sort.description: The sorting order of the results. Default is 'SubmissionTime:desc'. Options include 'LastApprovedAnswerSubmissionTime:desc', 'LastApprovedAnswerSubmissionTime:asc', 'SubmissionTime:desc', and 'SubmissionTime:asc'.

offset.description: The offset for paging through the results. Default is 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 6.

name: products_get_reviews
description: Fetches brief reviews of a product from the Shein API.

goods_spu.description: The value of 'productRelationID' returned in the /products/list or /products/search endpoints. Defaults to 'm22022854841'.

cat_id.description: The value of 'cat_id' returned in the /products/list or /products/search endpoints. Defaults to '1727'.

sku.description: The value of 'goods_sn' returned in the /products/list or /products/search endpoints. Defaults to 'rm2202285484176751'.

goods_id.description: The value of 'goods_id' field returned in the /products/list or /products/search endpoints. Defaults to '10196865'.

name: get_likecounts_by_itemids_styleids
description: Retrieves like counts for specified item IDs and style IDs from the Zappos API.

name: products_v2_list_recommended
description: This function retrieves a list of recommended products from the Target API based on a given store ID and TCINs.

store_id.description: The ID of the store for which to get recommendations. This value should match the location ID returned from a previous call to the stores/list endpoint.

tcins.description: The TCINs (Target.com Item Numbers) for which to get product recommendations. This value should come from a previous call to the products/list endpoint.

name: products_search
description: Search for products by a specified keyword and optional filters, with support for pagination and sorting.

keyword.description: The term or phrase to search for related products.

filters.description: Filters to apply to the product search results. Multiple filters can be specified using the format `key~value`. For example, 'colorList~White&masterClID~180'.

curpage.description: The current page number for paginated results. Default is 1.

itemsperpage.description: The number of items to display per page. Default is 48.

sortby.description: The field by which to sort the results. Default is 0.

name: get_1688_product_detail
description: Fetches detail of a product from 1688 using the provided product ID and RapidAPI key.

is_id.description: The ID of the product to fetch details for from 1688.

name: product_reviews
description: Fetches and paginates through product reviews on Amazon for a given product.

asin.description: Product ASIN for which to get reviews.

sort_by.description: Sort order for reviews. Default is `TOP_REVIEWS`. Allowed values are `TOP_REVIEWS`, `MOST_RECENT`.

verified_purchases_only.description: Only return reviews by reviewers who made a verified purchase.

page_size.description: Number of reviews to return per page. Allowed values range from `1` to `20`. Default is `10`.

page.description: Page number of results to return. Default is `1`.

star_rating.description: Filter reviews by star rating. Default is `ALL`. Allowed values are `ALL`, `5_STARS`, `4_STARS`, `3_STARS`, `2_STARS`, `1_STARS`, `POSITIVE`, `CRITICAL`.

images_or_videos_only.description: Only return reviews containing images and/or videos.

country.description: Marketplace country, language, and currency. Default is `US`. Allowed values are `US`, `AU`, `BR`, `CA`, `CN`, `FR`, `DE`, `IN`, `IT`, `MX`, `NL`, `SG`, `ES`, `TR`, `AE`, `GB`, `JP`.

name: stores
description: Fetches a list of all IKEA stores in a specified country.

countrycode.description: The two-letter country code representing the country for which to fetch the list of stores.

name: stores_list
description: Returns a list of stores near the provided geographic location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the geographic location.

latitude.description: The latitude of the geographic location.

radius.description: The radius in miles to search for stores around the geographic location. Defaults to 25.

name: get_awesome_product_details
description: Fetches detailed information about a product using a given product ID from the Amazon Data Scraper API.

productid.description: The unique identifier for the product to retrieve details for.

name: getproductsku
description: Fetches price information for a product identified by its SKU from the RapidAPI price tracker service.

product_sku.description: The SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) of the product to retrieve price information for.

name: get_stores
description: Fetches a list of stores from the "Get Promo Codes" API.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

name: aliexpress_item_description
description: Fetches the detailed description of an AliExpress item using its item ID.

itemid.description: The ID of the AliExpress item.

locale.description: The locale for displaying titles and content in the selected language. Defaults to None.

name: products_search_by_barcode
description: Search for a product in the Kohl's database using its UPC barcode.

upc.description: The Universal Product Code of the product to be searched.

name: product_categorization
description: Categorizes a product based on its title and optional price using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

title.description: The title of the product to be categorized.
title.default: Abstract Egghead Plus Size Female Mannequin - Matte White Item

price.description: The price of the product. Default is 200.

name: stores_get_details
description: Fetch detailed information for a specific store location.

location_id.description: The identifier for the store location, often obtained from the stores list endpoint.

name: navigations_get_tabs
description: Fetches navigation tabs for a given language, country, and currency using the unofficial SHEIN API.

name: countries_detail
description: Fetch detailed information of a country from the unofficial Shein API.

region.description: The region code to fetch details for a specific country. Default is 'US'.

name: get_amazon_product_details
description: Fetches the general product description of a specified Amazon product.

productid.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon product.

api_key.description: An API key for accessing the Amazon data scraper service. Defaults to None.

name: get_comments_from_product_id
description: Retrieve comments for a given product ID from the Trendyol API.

product_id.description: The unique identifier for the product whose comments are to be retrieved.

name: get_amazon_search_results
description: Fetches Amazon search results for a given query using the Toolbench RapidAPI Key.

searchquery.description: The search term to query on Amazon.

name: get_product_detail
description: Fetch product details by item ID from the Yiwugo product data API.

item_id.description: The unique identifier of the product.

lan.description: The language code for the data source, where 'en' is for English and 'cn' is for Chinese. Defaults to None.

name: search_autocomplete
description: Fetches product autocompletion suggestions based on a search keyword.

q.description: The search keyword for which to get autocompletion suggestions.

name: search_by_keyword
description: Searches for products using a specified keyword on the 1688 platform through the Taobao-Tmall Product Detail API.

keyword.description: The search keyword to look for products.

page.description: The page number for paginated results.

name: navigations_get_node_content
description: Fetches the content of a node in a navigation hierarchy.

is_id.description: The 'id' field value returned from the /navigations/get-root endpoint.

cat_id.description: The 'cat_id' field value returned from the /navigations/get-tabs endpoint.

name: tmall_search_by_keyword
description: Searches for products on Tmall by keyword.

page.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for products.

name: product_details
description: Fetch product details from the given URL using the Axesso Kaufland Data Service API.

url.description: The URL of the product to look up.

name: get_brandlist_by_siteid_zappos_1_6pm_2
description: Retrieve the brand list from the Zappos or 6pm websites by site ID using the RapidAPI.

siteid.description: The site ID to fetch the brand list from (1 for Zappos, 2 for 6pm).

name: product_category_list
description: Fetches the list of Amazon product categories for a specified country or marketplace.

country.description: Sets the marketplace country, language, and currency.

name: getbarcode
description: Retrieves price information based on a barcode from the South Africa Price Tracker API.

barcode.description: The barcode of the product to look up.

name: get_comments_with_product_id
description: Retrieve comments for a given product ID from the specified API.

product_id.description: The ID of the product for which to retrieve comments.

name: amazonproductreviews
description: Retrieves product reviews from Amazon using the provided API key, domain, and product ASIN.

pagenum.description: The page number of reviews to retrieve. Each page contains 10 reviews.

domain.description: The Amazon domain to query reviews from (e.g., 'amazon.com', 'amazon.in', 'amazon.co.uk').

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the product to retrieve reviews for.

name: get_all_brands
description: Fetches all available brands from the iHerb Product Data API for a given page number.

page.description: The page number to retrieve brands from.

name: zappos_search_product
description: Searches for products on Zappos using the given keyword and various optional parameters for sorting and pagination.

keyword.description: The search term to use for finding products on Zappos.

sort.description: The sorting criteria for the search results. Possible values are 'best_seller', 'relevance', 'low_to_high', 'high_to_low', 'customer_rating', 'new_arrivals', and 'brand_name'. Defaults to 'new_arrivals'.

page.description: The page number for pagination of search results. Defaults to 1.

name: search_shops
description: Search for shops using a specified keyword.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for shops.

lan.description: The language of the website to search (default is None). For instance, "en" for English or "cn" for Chinese.

page.description: The page number of search results (default is 1).

pagesize.description: The number of results per page (default is 10).

name: get_price_by_styleids_and_siteid_zappos_1_6pm_2
description: Fetch the price information for specific style IDs and site ID from the Zappos API.

siteid.description: The site ID for which the price information is requested.

styleids.description: The style IDs for which the price information is requested.

name: product_offers
description: Fetch all offers available for a specific product, given its product ID, and optional country and language preferences.

product_id.description: The ID of the product for which to fetch offers.

country.description: Country code of the region/country to return offers for. Default is 'us'. Valid values can be found at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2.

language.description: The language of the results. Default is 'en'. Valid values can be found at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes.

name: product_fulfillment
description: Fetches product fulfillment information from Target's API based on provided parameters.

accept.description: Content types that are acceptable for the response (default is 'application/json').

accept_language.description: List of acceptable languages for the response (default is 'en-US,en;q=0.9').

zip.description: The zipcode of the user's search location (default is '94611').

state.description: State code of the user's location (default is 'CA').

store_id.description: The ID of the Target store from which the fulfillment information is being retrieved (default is '3330').

name: tax_rate
description: Retrieve the tax rate for a given zip code using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

zipcode.description: The zip code for which to retrieve the tax rate.

name: get_product_s_offers
description: Fetches the offers for a given product from the Amazon Data Scraper API.

productid.description: The unique identifier for the product whose offers you want to retrieve.

name: taobao_search_by_keyword
description: Search for products on Taobao using a specified keyword and return the search results.

page.description: The page number to retrieve from the search results.

keyword.description: The search keyword to use for querying products.

name: search_for_a_product
description: Searches for a product by name using the RapidAPI service.

q.description: The product name or search query.

name: shopify_store_products
description: Retrieve all products from a Shopify store using the specified API.

page.description: The page number to retrieve products from.

url.description: The base URL of the Shopify store.

name: get_product_s_reviews
description: Fetches reviews for a specified product using the Amazon Data Scraper API.

productid.description: The unique identifier of the product whose reviews are to be fetched.

name: aliexpress_item_shipping_detail
description: Retrieve detailed shipping information for a specific Aliexpress item.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item to consider for shipping. Defaults to 1.

sellerid.description: The ID of the seller. Defaults to None.

ext.description: Additional parameter obtained from one of the Item Detail Endpoints for more accurate shipping options. Defaults to a predefined value.

locale.description: Locale parameter for displaying titles and other content in the selected language. Defaults to None.

region.description: Region parameter to accurately get shipping costs and other promotions for a specific geographic location. Defaults to None.

currency.description: Currency parameter for displaying the product price in the selected currency. Defaults to None.

name: aliexpress_store_info
description: Fetches detailed store information from AliExpress using the given seller ID and optional locale, region, and currency parameters.

sellerid.description: The ID of the AliExpress seller whose store information is requested.

locale.description: The locale to display the titles and other content in the selected language.

region.description: The region to accurately get the shipping costs and other promo/deals for a specific geo-location.

currency.description: The currency to display the product price in the selected currency.

name: product_data
description: Fetches detailed information about a specific product from the Ecommerce Product API.

product.description: The name of the product to retrieve information for.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Defaults to 1.

name: fetch_company_details
description: Fetch company details by company name using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

query.description: The company name to search for.

name: search_product
description: This function searches for a product using the Tokopedia API based on the given query and act parameters.

query.description: The search query string for the product to be searched.

act.description: The action parameter to specify the type of search.

name: get_images_by_productid_siteid_zappos_1_6pm_2
description: Fetch images for a given product ID and site ID from the Zappos API.

siteid.description: The site ID (1 for Zappos, 2 for 6pm).

productid.description: The product ID for which images are to be fetched.

name: zappos_product_detail_by_product_id
description: Fetches real-time product information from Zappos by product ID.

product_id.description: The ID of the product to be fetched.

name: aliexpress_item_detail_2
description: Fetch detailed information for a specific AliExpress item.

currency.description: The currency in which to display the product price. Valid values are listed in the '**Currency List**' at the '**Base**' group endpoints.

region.description: The region to accurately get shipping costs and other promotions specific to a geographic location. Valid values are listed in the '**Country List**' at the '**Base**' group endpoints.

locale.description: The locale to display titles and other content in the selected language. Valid values are listed in the '**Locale List**' at the '**Base**' group endpoints.

name: bestbuyproductdata
description: Fetches product data from Best Buy based on the search keyword and page number.

keyword.description: The search term to look for products, e.g., "iphone", "ps5", "sony tv".

page.description: The page number to retrieve, starting from 1.

name: nearby_stores
description: Fetches a list of stores near a specified ZIP code from the RapidAPI Target API.

place.description: The ZIP code or address around which to search for stores.

within.description: The radius of the search area in miles. Defaults to '100'.

limit.description: The maximum number of store results to return. Defaults to '20'.

name: aliexpress_item_detail_simple
description: Fetches and returns the details of a single item from AliExpress.

locale.description: The locale to display the titles and other content in the selected language. Only supported values from AliExpress are accepted.

currency.description: The currency to display the product price. Only supported values from AliExpress are accepted.

region.description: The region to accurately get the shipping costs and other promotions for a specific geo-location. Only supported values from AliExpress are accepted.

name: products_v2_list
description: Fetches a list of products from the ASOS store with various filtering and sorting options.

store.description: The store identifier obtained from the countries/list API.

offset.description: The offset to skip already viewed products.

categoryid.description: The category identifier from the categories/list API.

limit.description: The number of items per page.

attribute_1046.description: Filter by style, multiple values separated by comma.

attribute_10147.description: Filter by leather/non-leather, multiple values separated by comma.

sort.description: Sorting option, one of 'pricedesc', 'priceasc', or 'freshness'; default is 'freshness'.

q.description: Search query for products by name (do not use with categoryId).

base_colour.description: Filter by color, multiple values separated by comma.

range.description: Filter by sale/new season, multiple values separated by comma.

attribute_1047.description: Filter by product type, multiple values separated by comma.

currency.description: Currency code obtained from countries/list API; default is 'USD'.

attribute_10155.description: Filter by range, multiple values separated by comma.

sizeschema.description: Size schema identifier obtained from countries/list API; default is 'US'.

brand.description: Filter by brand, multiple values separated by comma.

size.description: Filter by size, multiple values separated by comma.

name: aliexpress_store_item_search
description: Searches for items in an AliExpress store.

sort.description: The sorting order of the items. Default is None.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Default is None.

pagesize.description: The number of items to display per page. Default is None.

region.description: The region to accurately get shipping costs and other deals. Default is None.

locale.description: The locale to display the titles and content in the selected language. Default is None.

currency.description: The currency to display the product price in. Default is None.

name: aliexpress_item_search
description: Searches for items on AliExpress based on various filters and criteria.

brandid.description: The brand ID to filter items by. Defaults to None.

catid.description: The category ID to filter items by. Defaults to None.

page.description: The page number of the search results. Defaults to 1.

loc.description: The location to filter items by. Defaults to None.

locale.description: The locale to display titles and content in the selected language. Defaults to None.

endprice.description: The upper price limit to filter items by. Defaults to None.

sort.description: The sort order of the search results. Defaults to None.

attr.description: The attributes to filter items by, separated by semicolons. Defaults to None.

startprice.description: The lower price limit to filter items by. Defaults to None.

region.description: The region to get accurate shipping costs and promotions. Defaults to None.

currency.description: The currency to display the product prices in. Defaults to None.

name: aliexpress_item_detail_3
description: Fetch detailed information about a specific AliExpress item.

currency.description: Currency for displaying the product price. Only supported currencies are accepted.

region.description: Region for accurate shipping costs and promotions. Only supported regions are accepted.

locale.description: Locale for displaying titles and content in the desired language. Only supported locales are accepted.

name: keyword_search
description: Retrieves search results for a given keyword from the Otto e-commerce site using the RapidAPI Axesso service.

page.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve.

keyword.description: The search term to look for in the Otto database.

sortby.description: The sorting criteria for the search results (default is 'topseller').

name: navigations_get_root
description: Fetches the root categories related to a specified tab from the navigations endpoint.

channeltype.description: The value of the 'id' field returned in the /navigations/get-tabs endpoint.

name: aliexpress_item_search_2
description: Searches for items on AliExpress with various filtering options and returns the results.

endprice.description: Maximum price of the items to be searched.

sort.description: Sorting option for the search results.

brandid.description: Brand ID(s). Multiple IDs can be separated with a comma.

page.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

attr.description: Attribute(s) for filtering results. Multiple values are separated with semicolons.

startprice.description: Minimum price of the items to be searched.

locale.description: Locale for displaying titles and other content in the selected language.

switches.description: Additional filter switches. Multiple values can be separated with a comma.

catid.description: Category ID(s). Multiple IDs can be separated with a comma.

loc.description: Location for filtering the search results.

currency.description: Currency for displaying the product prices.

region.description: Region for getting accurate shipping costs and promotions.
